import {useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Navbar from "../Helpers/Navbar"; import Footer from "../Helpers/Footer"; export default function ProductDetails() { const params = useParams(); const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { let product_id = params.id; axios.get(`/products/${product_id}`) .then((res) => { setProduct(res.data.product); }) }, [params]); return ( <>
